text: EBE or Ebe may refer to: == People == ;Given name * Ebe Stignani (1903–1974), Italian opera singer * Ebe W. Tunnell (1844–1917), 50th governor of Delaware ;Surname * Thierry Ebe (born 1976), Swiss footballer * Valerie Ebe (born 1947), Nigerian lawyer == Other uses == * Ebe (schooner), an Italian training ship * Extraterrestrial Biological Entity * "E.B.E." (The X-Files), an episode of The X-Files * European Bridges Ensemble, a music group
title: Ebe
